body: This pair of thin and faceted ruby crystals fit over the wearer's eyes. On command, the wearer can use charm monster (Will DC 19 to negate), or once per day the wearer can use dominate person (Will DC 20 to negate) instead.
name: Mindmaster's Eyes
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Eyes/Eyes Slot Wondrous Items/Mindmasters Eyes
